p: Lets you edit an existing character or monster to change their characteristics. The Edit option is grayed out whenever no character is selected.
This menu option opens an edit dialog which looks just like the Add dialog. Make the necessary changes and then click OK.
It is common to use this option when a player's character goes up or down a level or when you notice an invalid value in a monster you previously defined.

p.i: Click to enlarge and read about the entries in that dialog
